{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP11 |revision=v2.2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/03/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2422AP-0T |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O7J-GL2422AP |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.3 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2422T4 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=VIA |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.251 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Instant Wireless Network Access Point''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP11}} This device shares the same basic hardware as the [[USRobotics USR2249]] (pictures). [http://www.zero13wireless.net/foro/showthread.php?3254-Al-Descubierto!-Linksys-WAP11-v.2 Dissected]
[http://wireless.gumph.org/articles/wap11-insides.html WAP11 insides] The default SSID is almost assuredly '''linksys'''. {{WiFiCert|W000693|11/04/2002}}
